MAN.TITLE: linsolve

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : a na x ma real matrix (possibly sparse)
: a na x 1 vector (same row dimension as A)
: a ma x k real matrix

DESCRIPTION.P: linsolve computes all the solutions to A*x+b=0.
x0 is a particular solution (if any) and kerA= nullspace of A. Any x=x0+kerA*w with arbitrary w satisfies A*x+b=0.
If compatible x0 is given on entry, x0 is returned. If not a compatible x0, if any, is returned.

MAN.EXAMPLE: A=rand(5,3)*rand(3,8); b=A*ones(8,1);[x,kerA]=linsolve(A,b);A*x+b //compatible b b=ones(5,1);[x,kerA]=linsolve(A,b);A*x+b //uncompatible b A=rand(5,5);[x,kerA]=linsolve(A,b), -inv(A)*b //x is unique
